sentence.Network_en: When cooked, drain off the juices and put the meat in a processor or mincer.

sentence.Network_en: With a household food mincer, one can cook many kinds of food for immediate consumption.
sentence.Network_cn: 有了家用食品粉碎机, 很多食品都可以现做现吃了.

entry.def: A mincer is a machine which cuts meat into very small pieces by forcing it through very small holes.

means.word_mean: 1. a kitchen utensil that cuts or chops food (especially meat) into small pieces
